Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. This unique offering is priced at $9500, representing an exceptional deal considering its true worth. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns and benefits. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing an asset that is unparalleled in its quality and functionality. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
